data.title: Lovecraft
data.meta_description: Some posts related to Lovecraft: Reading Bitter Bierce: The Lovecraft Connection Yog-Sothothery Below is an index of reviewed titles related to the life, fiction, and legacy of H. P. Lovecraft including the Cthulhu Mythos. I have not listed individual works of poetry. I've been very liberal with my inclusions including stories from Lovecraft related anthologies…
data.text:
Some posts related to Lovecraft:

Reading Bitter Bierce: The Lovecraft Connection

Yog-Sothothery

Below is an index of reviewed titles related to the life, fiction, and legacy of H. P. Lovecraft including the Cthulhu Mythos. I have not listed individual works of poetry.

I’ve been very liberal with my inclusions including stories from Lovecraft related anthologies which have little discernable connection to that writer.

“Raw Feed” items are essentially my lightly edited notes on a work.

“Low Res Scan” items are reviews that don’t cover all a book’s contents.
